row.Description: $Id: FAE_info_pt.xml 4461 2019-02-06 10:35:31Z gorthe $
Barramento CAN bus perturbado, barramento CAN bus não alcançou o modo de operação adicional
row.ExtText: CAN bus error, CAN bus has not reached normal operating mode
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Check Can bus connection ( plug loose / cable defective / ... ) - Other Can bus subscriber not working - Incorrect setting ( parameters / Dip switches / final resistor / ... )

row.Description: Barramento CAN bus perturbado, barramento CAN bus está passivo ou transbordos de tampão na comunicação CAN
row.ExtText: CAN bus error, CAN bus passive or buffer overflows in CAN communication
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - CAN bus connection incorrect - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: K1 não se comporta como esperado (não actua, não se desexcita, fällt nicht ab, geração da tensão de comando, contacto de retorno)
row.ExtText: K1 shows unexpected behaviour (does not pull up, does not drop, generation of control voltage feedback contact)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: > K1 defective or K1 wiring incorrect > Configuration of DR control (jumper / bridges) incorrect > Parameter seting does not correspond to the limit switch variant > DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Up to SW V2.47 => emergency operation (lowering V1) and message From SW V3.00 => emergency operation, message and removal of enable in the case of parallel operation

row.Description: O termo-contacto do motor de elevação (da ponte) reagiu
row.ExtText: Thermal contact of hoist motor tripped
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Motor overheated - Thermal contact defective - Connection to motor defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: Uma saída não assume o estado desejado
Curso de frenagem máximo permtido od mecanismo de elevação foi ultrapassado (Distância de trenagem máxima permitida da ponte foi ultrapassada [somente com sensor de rotações])
row.ExtText: Max. permissible braking distance of hoist unit exceeded
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Check brake - Parameter error - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: Diferença máxima permitida entre dois mecanismos de elevação com marcha síncirona foi ultrapassada
row.ExtText: Maximum permitted path difference between two hoists in simultaneous operation exceeded
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Simultaneous operation not possible due to mechanical or electrical problems - "Maximum simultaneous running difference" parameter defective - Inverter defective or incorrectly programmed

row.Description: Ao ligar o mecanismo de elevação ficou-se abaixo do ponto de comutação cabo lasso
row.ExtText: While unloading hoist unit, value dropped below slack rope switching point
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Spreader lowered with active slack rope function - Incorrect parameter programming (dead load / ZMS setting values / reeving /... ) - External interference (EMC) - Load detection (ZMS) defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Defeito de software: Dados da avaliação ZMS não foram correctamente analizados
row.ExtText: Software error: Data for ZMS evaluation not correctly initialized or distorted at a later date
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Incorrect parameter programming - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Lifting no longer possible + "Parameter error" horn sequence

row.Description: Valor medido do ZMS 1 dem. pequeno com gancho vazio
row.ExtText: Measuring value of ZMS 1 with empty hook too small
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Incorrect parameter programming (ZMS offset) - External interference (EMC) - Load detection (ZMS) defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Valor medido do ZMS 2 dem. pequeno com gancho vazio
row.ExtText: Measuring value of ZMS 2 with empty hook too small
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 10

row.Description: A monitoração da alimentação +/-12 V do ZMS detectou um defeito
row.ExtText: Monitoring system of +/-12 V supply for ZMS has detected an error
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - External interference (EMC) - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Na verificação foi detectado um erro na avaliação ZMS devido à desafinação
row.ExtText: Error on ZMS evaluation detected during check caused by deviation
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: > Load detection (ZMS) defective > ZMS wiring defective > DR control system error (replace control system) (Error is retained for approx. 3 minutes)

row.Description: A diferença de carga entre dois mecanismo de elevação é demasiado grande
row.ExtText: Load difference between two hoist units too large
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Normal operating status - Parameter error - Load detection (ZMS) defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Hauptcontroller hat Überlast erkannt, Überwachungscontroller (noch) nicht
row.ExtText: Main controller has detected overload, monitoring controller not (yet)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: noch nicht verwendet
row.ExtText: not yet used
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: not yet used

row.Description: Avaliação sensor de rotações do curso de elevação: o valor teórico está presente, mas o eixo está parado
row.ExtText: Evaluation rotary encoder lifting: Setpoint value available, however, axis at standstill
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Motor not turning - Motor cable defective - Rotary encoder defective - Rotary encoder cable defective - Rotary encoder amplifier module defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Avaliação sensor de rotações do curso de elevação: não há valor teórico, mas o eixo não está parado
row.ExtText: Evaluation rotary encoder lifting: No setpoint value available, however, axis not at standstill
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Motor turning without setpoint value specification (detail analysis required) - Rotary encoder defective

row.Description: Avaliação sensor de rotações do curso de elevação: Há valor teórica e o eixo desloca-se dem. rápido
row.ExtText: Evaluation rotary encoder lifting: Setpoint value available and axis travels too fast
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Motor turning faster than setpoint value - Parameter error (50 / 60 Hz settings) - Line frequency fluctuation - Rotary encoder, driver module or cable defective - DIP switch 7 set wrong - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: O conversor de frequência da elevação avisa uma perturbação, a descrição exacta da perturbação pode ser lida na memória de defeitos do conversor de frequência da elevação através de software PC
row.ExtText: Hoist FI signals an error, the precise error description can be read in the error memory of the hoist FI via PC software
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Message of inverter after actuation of emergency stop - Other inverter error. The precise error description Can be read in The error memor of The hoist FI via PC software

row.Description: O conversor de frequência do carrinho (da ponte) não avisa operacionalidade. Causas possíveis: contacto térmico
row.ExtText: Trolley inverter does not signal to be ready. Possible causes: Thermal contact
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Check travel motor thermal contact - Otherwise read the error memory of the hoist FI via PC software

row.Description: Avaliação sensor de rotações elevação: o valor teórica está presente e o eixo desloca-se demasiado lento
row.ExtText: Evaluation rotary encoder lifting: Setpoint value available and axis travels too slow
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Brake defective - Parameter error (50 / 60 Hz settings or rated speed) - Line frequency fluctuation - Rotary encoder defective - Rotary encoder cable defective - Rotary encoder amplifier module defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Contacto de sobrecorrente duma resistência de frenagem actuou (conversor de frequência da elevação)
row.ExtText: Overcurrent contact of one braking resistor tripped (hoist FI)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Hoist inverter defective - Overcurrent contact defective - Overcurrent contact tripped - Inverter / overcurrent contact connection defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Um dos valores hexadecimais dos interruptores fornece um valor inválido ( superior a 15 )
row.ExtText: Hex switch value invalid (larger than 15)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: ainda não utiliizado
row.ExtText: Programmed parameters do not match hardware configuration (for modular hardware)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Parameter error - control system fitted with incorrect modules - module defective (replace module) - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Erro na monitoração dinâmica de sinais relacionado à segurança (ODDS)
row.ExtText: Error of dynamic monitoring of safety relevant signals (ODDS) Parameter missing or has invalid value, detected by check-sum check
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system) - Parameter error - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1) Crane contactor is switched off

row.Description: O parâmetro falta ou tem um valor inválido, foi detectado através de uma verificação cíclica da soma de teste
row.ExtText: Error of dynamic monitoring of safety relevant signals (ODDS) Parameter missing or has invalid value, detected by check-sum check
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system) - Parameter error - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1) Crane contactor is switched off

row.Description: O interruptor DIP 5 está numa posição errada ou a ponte/carrinho estão incorrectamente parametrizados
row.ExtText: DIP switch 5 in incorrect position or incorrect parameter setting of crane/trolley
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Parameter error (trolley - crane setting) - Dip switch 5 incorrectly set

row.Description: Monitoração do estado de ligação de K2 detectou um desvio do estado de ligalção esperado
row.ExtText: K2 switching status monitoring has detected deviation from expected switching status
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: For ISS: DR control system error (replace control system) for HSS: - K2 defective (replace contactor set) - Cable loom to contactor set defective (replace contactor set) - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Up to SW V2.47 => hoist stops but no info to hoist unit working in parallel From SW V3.00 => hoist stops, removal of enable in the case of parallel operation

row.Description: Monitoração do estado de ligação de K3 detectou um desvio do estado de ligalção esperado
row.ExtText: K3 switching status monitoring has detected deviation from expected switching status
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: For ISS: DR control system error (replace control system) for HSS: - K3 defective (replace contactor set) - Cable loom to contactor set defective (replace contactor set) - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Up to SW V2.47 => hoist stops but no info to hoist unit working in parallel From SW V3.00 => hoist stops, removal of enable in the case of parallel operation

row.Description: O contacto de monitoração do travão de elevação avisa um travão inadmissivelmente levantado
row.ExtText: Monitoring contact of hoist brake signals an impermissible brake release
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Brake / brake coil defective - Micro switch (brake release contact) incorrectly set - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: ainda não utiliizado
row.ExtText: not yet used
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: not yet used

row.Description: Defeito e hardware ZMS1 / SGS: > ZMS: ZMS com defeito, não ligado ou tem cabo quebrado > SGS: A frequência do sinal para captar o estado de ligação do SGS é demasiado alta
row.ExtText: Hardware error ZMS1 / SGS: > ZMS: ZMS defective, not connected or has broken wire > SGS: Frequency of signal for detection of switching status of SGS too high
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - ZMS defective - ZMS not connected - ZMS conductor broken - Parameter error - EMC interference- DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: A chave limite superior de emergência foi activada sem que se tenha feita uma verificação da chave limte
row.ExtText: Emergency limit switch top tripped without Limit switch check
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Limit switches incorrectly set - Jumper settings wrong for limit switches - Parameter error - Error when checking limit switches (incorrect sequence) - Geared limit switch / cable defective - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Hoist unit is stopped until the next time it is switched off and on again.

row.Description: A chave limite inferior de emergência foi activada sem que se tenha feita uma verificação da chave limte
row.ExtText: Emergency limit switch bottom tripped without Limit switch check
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 34
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Hoist unit is stopped until the next time it is switched off and on again.

row.Description: O contacto de monitoração do travão de elevação avisa que o travão não se deixa levantar
row.ExtText: Monitoring contact of hoist brake signals that brake cannot be released
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Brake / brake coil defective - Micro switch (brake release contact) incorrectly set - Motor protection switch not switched on - Motor supply cable defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: ainda não utiliizado
row.ExtText: not yet used
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: not yet used

row.Description: Avaliação do sensor de rotações da elevação: o valor teórico está presente e o eixo desloca-se para o sentido errado
row.ExtText: Evaluation rotary encoder lifting: Setpoint value available and axis moves into wrong direction - Phases swapped
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Rotary encoder defective - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Hoist stops Attention: Error stored until next start-up!

row.Description: ainda não utiliizado
row.ExtText: not yet used
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: not yet used

row.Description: Falta o consentimento da ponte para ligar K1 através do barramento CAN bus (Falta o consentimento de pelo menos um carrinho para ligar o contactor da ponte através do barramento CAN bus)
row.ExtText: OK of crane for switching K1 on via CAN bus missing
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Can bus defective (see error 1) - Parameter error (crane, trolley, solo travelling hoist) - Dip switch 5 incorrectly set - Crane control system failed (e.g. no control voltage) - Consequential error following crane control system error

row.Description: Mensagem interna do comando em caso de sobrecarga
row.ExtText: Internal control system message on overload Hardware error ZMS2: ZMS defective, not connected or has broken wire
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: Internal control system message on overload See error 33
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Lifting no longer possible Lifting no longer possible

row.Description: Defeito hardware ZMS2: ZMS cin defeitom, não conectado ou quebra do cabo
row.ExtText: Internal control system message on overload Hardware error ZMS2: ZMS defective, not connected or has broken wire
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: Internal control system message on overload See error 33
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Lifting no longer possible Lifting no longer possible

row.Description: ainda não utiliizado
row.ExtText: Error of double limit switch monitoring system
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: > Limit switches/actuators incorrectly fitted >Limit switches defective >Cable connection to limit switch defective >Parameters, jumpers and limit switch configuration do not match >DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Only limited emergency operation still possible (lowering and travelling at small speed). Attention: Error is saved until the next start-up.

row.Description: Erro na sequência de ligações das chaves limite da ponte (carrinho(s))
row.ExtText: Error in switching sequence of trolley limit switches
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Limit switches/actuators incorrectly fitted - Limit switch, supply line or connector defective - Parameters and limit switch configuration do not match - Short circuit protection Usichi has switched off (briefly) - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Erro na sequência de ligações das chaves limite da elevação
row.ExtText: Error in switching sequence of hoist limit switches
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Geared limit switch incorrectly adjusted - Geared limit switch defective - Cable connection to limit switch defective - Parameters, jumpers and limit switch setting do not match - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: O software do controlador de monitoração desvia do comportamento de tempo previsto
row.ExtText: Software of monitoring controller deviates from planned time behaviour The number of safety relevant control signals has exceeded the limit value
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system) - 2 CAN control sources are connected to the CAN bus
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Hoist stops Crane contactor is switched off

row.Description: noch nicht verwendet
row.ExtText: Software of monitoring controller deviates from planned time behaviour The number of safety relevant control signals has exceeded the limit value
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system) - 2 CAN control sources are connected to the CAN bus
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Hoist stops Crane contactor is switched off

row.Description: A comunicação com PRC/ponte automática está perturbada
row.ExtText: Communication error to PRC/automatic crane
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Check Can bus connection ( plug loose / cable defective / ... ) - PRC/automatic crane not working - Connection to PRC/automatic crane not working - Incorrect setting ( parameters / Dip switches / final resistor / ... )
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: All movements are stopped (control system acts as if emergency stop was actuated)

row.Description: Timeout na troca de dados necessários para a marcha síncrona entre dois mecanismos de elevação
row.ExtText: Synchronous operation timeout
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Error in exchange of position values between hoist units

row.Description: Com barramento CAN bus: barramento não está activo, erro SRDO ou foi activada a paragem de emergência Comando paralelo: paragem de emergência activada
row.ExtText: With CAN bus: Bus not active, SRDO error or emergency stop activated Parallel control: Emergency stop actuated
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Operating condition when switched on, if Emergency-stop on DSE is pressed (DSE8-R) - See error 1 - External interference (EMC) - Consequential error following safety-relevant malfunction of another CAN subscriber

row.Description: Contacto de monitoração do contactor da ponte avisa que o contactor da ponte não acuta
row.ExtText: Monitoring contact of crane contactor signals that crane contactor does not pull up
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Crane contactor not pulling up properly - Error in connection to crane contactor - Crane contactor feedback contact defective - Jumper for NoEmergencyStop signal (J101) incorrectly fitted or missing - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Erro na troca de informações com relevância de segurança sober o barramento CAN bus: SRDO falta; ordem de sequência, comportamnto de tempo ou conteúdo SRDO com defeito
row.ExtText: Error while exchanging safety-relevant information via CAN bus: SRDO missing; sequence, time behaviour or SRDO contents incorrect
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 50

row.Description: O contacto de monitoração do contactor da ponte avisa que o contactor da ponte não se desexcita
row.ExtText: Monitoring contact of crane contactor signals that crane contactor does not drop
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Crane contactor not dropping properly - Error in connection to crane contactor - Crane contactor feedback contact defective - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: All movements are stopped or prevented

row.Description: ainda não utiliizado
row.ExtText: Warning "impermissible operation"
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: One of the following impermissible functions has been caused: - Limit switch check with both hoist units at the same time
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Response of DR control system: - Lifting and lowering motions are prevented

row.Description: ainda não utiliizado
row.ExtText: Warning "Timeout after travel command": After a travel command, the travel motion was not started within the permissible time and therefore is prevented by the control system for safety reasons
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: > Another trolley blocks travel owing to malfunction or similar in the case of parallel operation > other parameter or hardware errors > Signal time before travel start only programmed for one of the two trolleys
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Motion of the axis concerned is not started

row.Description: A janela de medição da carga não foi alcançada dentro do tempo permitido
row.ExtText: Load detection window not reached in permitted time
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Binding brake, - Tight movement in gearbox - Incorrect DR parameter values: + “E_063_02” DR parameter line frequency not 50 or 60 Hz + “E_063_03” DR parameter hoist motor rated speed V1 + “E_063_04” DR parameter hoist motor rated speed V2
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: If incorrect parameters have been detected, the hoist stops

row.Description: Errore "Parâmetros errados para captação da cargat"
row.ExtText: "Parameter for load detection via slip evaluation incorrect" error
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - At least one load detection parameter has non-permitted value
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: If incorrect parameters have been detected, the hoist stops

row.Description: Advertência "A verificação da chave limite foi interromida"
row.ExtText: Warning "Limit switch check aborted"
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Limit switch check not completed - “Limit switch check” signal missing
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Operating limit switch active again (can also be acknowledged via STOP key)

row.Description: Advertência "Travão de retenção": Baixar não é possível porque o travão de retenção reagiu
row.ExtText: Warning "Catching brake": Lowering not possible, as catching brake has tripped.
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Catching brake really tripped - Signal contact/actuation defective - Cable to contact defective/not correctly connected - Jumper setting incorrect - Catching brake parameters programmed, but none available - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Hoist can only lift at slow speed

row.Description: Advertência "Chave limite": Translação no sentido desejado não é possível porque se activou a chave limite.
row.ExtText: Warning "While in limit switch": Moving in selected direction not possible, limit switch reached. - Limit switch really reached
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Limit switch or actuation defective - Cable to limit switch defective / not correctly connected - Jumper setting incorrect - Incorrect parameters programmed - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Movement in the direction switched off by the limit switch no longer possible

row.Description: Advertência "Stop devido à área bloqueada": A translação no sentido desejado é impedida através do comando de translação de desvio.
row.ExtText: Warning "Stop due to blocked area": Motion in selected direction is prevented by by-pass control system.
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Entry into blocked area attempted - Area switch or actuation defective - Cable to area switch defective / not correctly connected - Incorrect parameters programmed - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Movement in the direction of the blocked area no longer possible

row.Description: Advertência "Stop devido à carga excessiva na área com carga reduzida: O movimento para o sentido desejado é impedido porque a carga é demasiado grande para esta ára.
row.ExtText: Warning "Stop since load is too large for reduced load area": Moving in selected direction prevented, since load is too large for this area.
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Load too large for area with load reduction - Area switch or actuation defective - Cable to area switch defective / not correctly connected - Incorrect parameters programmed - Load detection defective (see overload) - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Movement in the direction of the area with reduced load no longer possible

row.Description: Advertência "Interface conversor de frequência ainda não disponível" O movimento para o sentido desejado é impedido porque os parâmetros necessários do conversor de frequência da elevação ainda não foram lidos ou foram erradamente estabelecidos.
row.ExtText: Warning "Inverter interface not available yet" Moving in selected direction not possible, because necessary hoist inverter parameters: - have not been read or are incorrectly programmed.
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: Operational message every time the crane is switched on. May also be caused by - Error in CAN connection to hoist inverter - Parameter 830 "Load spectrum operating mode" is programmed to "Off" instead
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: If no parameters can be read from the inverter, no lifting movement is possible

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: O cão de guarda do controlador de monitoração não trabalha
row.ExtText: Hardware error: Watchdog of monitoring controller not working
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: Porque a saída do controlador de monitoração para o comando do contactor da ponte não trabalha é apenas possível a operação de emergência de todos os eixos
row.ExtText: Hardware error: As output of monitoring controller for controlling crane contactor is not working only emergency operation of all axes possible
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: Devido a erros na monitoração dinâmica de sinais de relevância de segurança (ODDS) é apenas possível a operação de emergência de todos os eixos, eventualmtne falta a ponte ODDS no conector de uma entrada não utilizada (UniIn ou chave limite)
row.ExtText: Owing to error of dynamics monitoring of safety-relevant signals (ODDS), only emergency operation of all axes, ODDS bridge may be missing on connector of an unused input (UniIn or limit switch)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - ODDS signal (dynamic monitoring of the limit switches) defective - ODDS bridge missing on an unused limit switch - Limit switches defective
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: Devido a um erro de parametrização é apenas possível a operação de emergência de todos os eixos
row.ExtText: Parameters transmitted from HCS12 to PIC or reference values are not usable. Therefore, only emergency operation is possible
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: > Parameter error > Error in calculation of reference values > Detection of +/- 12 V for ZMS defective
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: Devido a um defeito do contactor do motor do carrinho é apenas permitida a operação de emergência
row.ExtText: Only emergency operation permissible owing to error of trolley motor contactor
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - No longer active, since trolley motor contactor left out (remove trolley motor contactor, if required)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation of trolley (travel at V1)

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: Porque a saída do controlador de monitoração para o comando do contactor K1 não pode ser desactivada, com o eixo K1 é apenas possível a operação de emergência
Defeito de hardware: Porque falta a retroalimentação do comando K1 falta, com eixo K1 és somente possível a operação de emergência
row.ExtText: Hardware error: As feedback of K1 control is missing, only emergency operation of K1 axis possible
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Contactor incorrectly connected after K1 replaced - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: Porque o controlador de monitoração não pode activar o travão, para o eixo K1 é somente possível a operação de emergência
row.ExtText: Hardware error: As monitoring controller cannot de-activate the brake, only emergency
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: A retroalimentação K1 fica activa, para o eixo K1 apenas é possível a operação de emergência
row.ExtText: operation of K1 a is permissible K1 feedback remains active, for K1 axis only emergency operation
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 70
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: Devido a defeitos do ZMS ou SGS é apenas possível a operação de emergência do mecanismo de elevação
row.ExtText: Hardware error: Only emergency operation of hoist unit owing to ZMS or SGS error
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 33
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Hoist can only lift at slow speed

row.Description: A chave limite de emergência foi activada sem que tenha sido activa a verificação da chave limite
row.ExtText: Emergency limit switch tripped without Limit switch check being active
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: see errors 34 and 35
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1)

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: O contactor do motor do carrinho não actua
row.ExtText: Hardware error: Trolley motor contactor does not pick up
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - No longer active, since trolley motor contactor left out (remove trolley motor contactor, if required)

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: Porque o controlador de monitoração não pode liberar o travão, não é possível a operação do mecanismo de elevação
row.ExtText: Hardware error: As monitoring controller cannot enable the brake, operation of hoist unit not possible
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 71

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: K1 não actua
row.ExtText: Hardware error: K1 does not pick up
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 3

row.Description: Erro do sentido de rotação da elevação
row.ExtText: Direction of revolution error Lifting:
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 38

row.Description: Falta o consentimento de pelo menos um carrinho para ligar o contactor da ponte através do barramento CAN bus
Falta o consentimento da ponte para ligarr K1 através do barramento CAN bus fehlt
row.ExtText: OK of min. one trolley for switching the crane contactor on via CAN bus missing OK of crane for switching K1 on via CAN bus missing
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 40

row.Description: O controlador de monitoração detectou sobrecarga, o controlador principal (ainda) não.
row.ExtText: Monitoring controller has detected overload, main controller not (yet)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Hoist can only lift at slow speed

row.Description: O controlador principal causa movimentos de translação do mecanismo de elevação para os quais não existem os correspondentes comandos de controlo.
row.ExtText: Main controller causes motions of hoist unit without the corresponding control commands being available
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system parameter error - Inverter parameter error - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: O controlador de monitoração detectou que o controlador principal origina movimentos de translação do carrinho (da ponte) para os quais não existem os correspondentes comandos.
row.ExtText: Monitoring controller has detected that main controller causes motions of the travelling hoist without the corresponding control commands being available
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: > DR control system parameter error (speed V1 too high) > For older SW version: Crab selection changed during travel > DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: A saída do controlador de monitoração para desligar o contactor da ponte está activa e por isso o barramento CAN bus está bloqueado
row.ExtText: Hardware error: Output of monitoring controller for switching off the crane contactor is active (o in modular hardware the output for switching off the CAN bus), this causes CAN bus to be blocked
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Evento: O comando do controlador principal para a passagem para o estado seguro foi recebido
row.ExtText: Event: Command from main controller to assume safe status was received
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Response of main controller to external interference (EMC) - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: O software do controlador principal desvia do comportamento de tempo previsto
row.ExtText: Software of main controller deviates from planned time behaviour
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: A monitoração do controlador principal detectou um defeito ou uma reacção faltante do controlador principal
row.ExtText: Monitoring system of main controller has detected an error or a missing response of main controller
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: A comunicação com PRC/ponte automática está perturbada
row.ExtText: Communication error to PRC/automatic crane
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 48

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: O controlador de monitoração detectou um próprio defeto de hardware
row.ExtText: Hardware error: Monitoring controller has detected own HW error
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Com barramento CAN bus: O barramento não está activo, defeitode SRDO ou o botão de emergência foi premida Comando paralelo: O botão da paragem de emergência foi premida
row.ExtText: Emergency stop / STOP actuated during axis movement (for CAN bus, bus may not be active, or SRDO error)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: Emergency stop / STOP actuated during axis movement

row.Description: Defeito do contactor da ponte: K1 e KMS são desligado
row.ExtText: Error of crane contactor: K1 and KMS are switched off
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 51

row.Description: Erro na troca de informações de relevância de segurança através do barramento CAN bus: SRDO falta, ordem de sequência, o comportamento de tempo ou o conteúdo de SRDO não é correcto
row.ExtText: Error while exchanging safety-relevant information via CAN bus: SRDO missing; sequence, time behavior of SRDO contents incorrect
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 50

row.Description: O contacto de monitoração do contactor da ponte avisa que o contactor da ponte não se desexcita
row.ExtText: Monitoring contact of crane contactor signals that crane contactor does not drop
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 53

row.Description: O contacto de monitoração de K1 avisa que o K1 não se desexcitat
row.ExtText: Monitoring contact of K1 signals that K1 does not drop
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 3

row.Description: O contactor do motor do carrinho KMS não se desexcita, o contactor da ponte é desligada
row.ExtText: KMS trolley motor contactor does not drop, crane contactor is switched off
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - No longer active, since trolley motor contactor left out (remove trolley motor contactor, if required)

row.Description: O controlador de monitoração detectou uma falha total do controlador principal
row.ExtText: Monitoring controller has detected complete failure of main controller
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.ExtText: not yet used
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: not yet used

row.Description: Barramento CAN bus perturbado, barramento CAN bus não alcançou o modo de operação adicional
row.ExtText: CAN bus error, CAN bus has not reached normal operating mode
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Check Can bus connection ( plug loose / cable defective / ... ) - Other Can bus subscriber not working - Incorrect setting ( parameters / Dip switches / final resistor / ... )

row.Description: Barramento CAN bus perturbado, barramento CAN bus está passivo ou transbordos de tampão na comunicação CAN
row.ExtText: CAN bus error, CAN bus passive or buffer overflows in CAN communication
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - CAN bus connection incorrect - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: K1 não se comporta como esperado (não actua, não se desexcita, fällt nicht ab, geração da tensão de comando, contacto de retorno)
row.ExtText: K1 shows unexpected behaviour (does not pull up, does not drop, generation of control voltage feedback contact)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: > K1 defective or K1 wiring incorrect > Configuration of DR control (jumper / bridges) incorrect > Parameter seting does not correspond to the limit switch variant > DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Up to SW V2.47 => emergency operation (lowering V1) and message From SW V3.00 => emergency operation, message and removal of enable in the case of parallel operation

row.Description: O termo-contacto do motor de elevação (da ponte) reagiu
row.ExtText: Thermal contact of crane motor tripped
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 4 - Short-circuit bridge missing for motors without thermal contact

row.Description: Defeito de hardware: Uma saída não assume o estado desejado
row.ExtText: Hardware error: One output of controller does not assume required status
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Curso de frenagem máximo permtido od mecanismo de elevação foi ultrapassado (Distância de trenagem máxima permitida da ponte foi ultrapassada [somente com sensor de rotações])
row.ExtText: Max. permissible braking distance of crane exceeded (only with rotary encoder)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: Implementation not possible due to missing encoder

row.ExtText: While unloading hoist unit, value dropped below slack rope switching point
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Spreader lowered with active slack rope function - Incorrect parameter programming (dead load / ZMS setting values / reeving /... ) - External interference (EMC) - Load detection (ZMS) defective - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: noch nicht verwendet
O conversor de frequência do carrinho (da ponte) não avisa operacionalidade. Causas possíveis: contacto térmico
row.ExtText: Crane inverter does not signal to be ready. Possible causes: Thermal contact
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: See error 19 - Line frequency fluctuation

row.Description: ainda não utiliizado
row.ExtText: Programmed parameters do not match hardware configuration (for modular hardware)
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Parameter error - control system fitted with incorrect modules - module defective (replace module) - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: Erro na monitoração dinâmica de sinais relacionado à segurança (ODDS)
row.ExtText: Error of dynamic monitoring of safety relevant signals (ODDS) Parameter missing or has invalid value, detected by check-sum check
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - DR control system error (replace control system) - Parameter error - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Reduced operation (lifting or lowering at V1) Crane contactor is switched off

row.Description: O parâmetro falta ou tem um valor inválido, foi detectado através de uma verificação cíclica da soma de teste
row.ExtText: Parameter missing or has invalid value, detected by check-sum check
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Parameter error - DR control system error (replace control system)

row.Description: O interruptor DIP 5 está numa posição errada ou a ponte/carrinho estão incorrectamente parametrizados
row.ExtText: DIP switch 5 in incorrect position or incorrect parameter setting of crane/trolley
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: - Parameter error (trolley - crane setting) - Dip switch 5 incorrectly set

row.Description: Monitoração do estado de ligação de K2 detectou um desvio do estado de ligalção esperado
row.ExtText: K2 switching status monitoring has detected deviation from expected switching status
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: For ISS: DR control system error (replace control system) for HSS: - K2 defective (replace contactor set) - Cable loom to contactor set defective (replace contactor set) - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Up to SW V2.47 => hoist stops but no info to hoist unit working in parallel From SW V3.00 => hoist stops, removal of enable in the case of parallel operation

row.Description: Monitoração do estado de ligação de K3 detectou um desvio do estado de ligalção esperado
row.ExtText: K3 switching status monitoring has detected deviation from expected switching status
row.Possible_malfunction_or_causes: For ISS: DR control system error (replace control system) for HSS: - K3 defective (replace contactor set) - Cable loom to contactor set defective (replace contactor set) - DR control system error (replace control system)
row.Behaviour_of_control_system: Up to SW V2.47 => hoist stops but no info to hoist unit working in parallel From SW V3.00 => hoist stops, removal of enable in the case of parallel operation
